medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment for unique identification of the Despatch Advice document, by means of its name and its number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, Date/time/period related to the whole message. The DTM segment must be specified at least once to identify the Despatch Advice date.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating that the message is subject to special conditions due to origin, customs preference or commercial factors.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying the weight and volume of the consignment.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment to transmit monetary amounts for the whole despatch required by the consignee to prepare customs clearance procedures.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments giving references where necessary, their dates relating to the whole message, e.g. contract number.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment for referencing documents relating to the whole despatch advice message, e.g. purchase orders, delivery instructions, import/export license.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, Date/time/period from the referred document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying names, addresses, locations, and required supporting documents relevant to the whole Despatch Advice.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
NAD, A segment for identifying names, addresses, and their functions relevant to the whole Despatch Advice. Identification of the parties involved is recommended for the Despatch Advice message, and is to be given in the NAD segment.
It is recommended that where possible, only the coded form of the party ID should be specified, e.g. the buyer and seller are known to each other, thus only the coded ID is required. The consignee or delivery address may vary and would have to be clearly specified, preferably in structured format.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating more details regarding specific places/locations related to the party specified in the NAD segment, e.g. internal site/building number.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments giving references relevant only to the specified party rather than the whole message.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment for referencing documents relating to the party specified by the NAD segment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment for specifying Date/time/period of the referred document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to identify the people, functions, departments and appropriate numbers to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify the person, function or department to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment to identify communication types and numbers for the person, function or department identified in the CTA.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments indicating terms of delivery.

medi:segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TOD, A segment indicating the terms of delivery and transfer for the whole despatch advice.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating locations relevant to the TOD segment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, Additional free text pertinent to terms of delivery. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments specifying details of the mode and means of transport and date/time of departure and destination relevant to the whole despatch advice.

medi:segment.name: Details of transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment specifying the carriage, and the mode and means of transport of the goods being despatched.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the percentage of utilization of the capacity of the means of transport.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments giving the location and date/time information relative to the transportation.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment indicating locations relevant to the transport specified in the TDT segment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment giving the date/time/period information of departure and/or arrival of the transported goods for the specified location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments providing information relative to the equipment used for the transportation of goods relevant to the whole despatch advice.

medi:segment.name: Equipment details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQD, A segment to define fixed information regarding equipment used in conjunction with the whole despatch advice, and if required, to indicate responsibility for supply of the equipment.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying physical measurements of equipment described in the EQD segment.

medi:segment.name: Seal number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEL, A segment specifying a seal number connected to a specific equipment named in the EQD.

medi:segment.name: Attached equipment
medi:segment.medi:documentation: EQA, A segment identifying equipment either attached to the equipment described in the EQD segment above, or equipment related to that described in the EQD segment, and which is further defined in a subsequent EQD segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments providing information on hazardous goods and their handling.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment providing information on handling and notification of hazardous materials in the specified equipment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
FTX, A segment with free text information in coded or clear form to give further clarification, when required, for hazardous material.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments providing details of all package levels and of the individual despatched items contained in the consignment. This segment group provides the capability to give the hierarchical packing relationships. The group defines a logical top-down order structure. The lowest level package information of the hierarchy is followed by the detail product information.

medi:segment.name: Consignment packing sequence
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CPS, A segment identifying the sequence in which packing of the consignment occurs, e.g. boxes loaded onto a pallet.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
FTX, A segment with free text information in coded or clear form to give further clarification, when required, as to the packing sequence.
In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments identifying packaging, physical dimensions, marks and numbers, quantities, date and time information, handling information and information about packing at this level.

medi:segment.name: Package
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAC, A segment specifying the number and type of the packages/physical units and the physical type of packaging for the despatched goods.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying physical measurements of the packages/physical units described in the PAC segment.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the quantity per package described in the PAC segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments providing information on hazardous goods and handling.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment providing information on required handling and notification of hazardous materials in the specified package.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information in coded or clear form to give further clarification, when required, for hazardous materials.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments specifying markings, labels, and packing numbers.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment specifying markings and/or labels used on individual physical units (packages) described in the PAC segment.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment for referencing the package identification e.g. master label number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment for specifying date/time/period related to the document referenced.

medi:segment.name: Related identification numbers
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIR, A segment providing set of package identification related numbers, e.g. a package label number and a KANBAN card number assigned to the same package.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments giving package identification numbers and, where relevant, delivery limitation information.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment providing the identity numbers of packages being despatched.

medi:segment.name: Delivery limitations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DLM, A segment to identify any limitation on delivery of goods, e.g. hold until final approval by supplier.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: NAD-TDT-HAN-FTX-MOA-SG16-SG17-SG18-SG19- SG20-SG23 A group of segments providing details of the individual despatched items.

medi:segment.name: Line item
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
LIN, A segment identifying the product being despatched.
All other segments in the detail section following the LIN segment refer to that line item.

medi:segment.name: Additional product id
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PIA, A segment providing additional product identification.

medi:segment.name: Item description
medi:segment.medi:documentation: IMD, A segment for describing the product being despatched. This segment should be used for products that cannot be identified by a product code or article number.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying physical measurements of the despatched item in original or unpacked form.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to give quantity information concerning the product.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment indicating that the line item is subject to special conditions due to origin, customs preference, or commercial factors.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment providing identity numbers of the goods being despatched, e.g. serial numbers for assembled equipment.

medi:segment.name: Related identification numbers
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIR, A segment providing sets of related identification numbers for a line item, e.g. engine number, chassis number and transmission number for a vehicle.

medi:segment.name: Delivery limitations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DLM, A segment to identify any limitation on delivery of goods e.g. hold until final approval by supplier.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment providing date, time information related to the line item, e.g. production date.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment for identifying names and addresses and their functions relevant to the item, e.g. manufacturer.

medi:segment.name: Details of transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TDT, A segment specifying the carriage, and the mode and means of transport of the goods being despatched, e.g. shipment/consignment number, shipping method, carrier.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment providing information on the handling and notification of hazardous materials.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information in coded or clear form to give further clarification, when required, to the line item. In computer to computer exchanges such text will normally require the receiver to process this segment manually.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment giving monetary amounts required by the consignee to undertake customs clearance procedures.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments to give reference numbers and dates.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying documents related to the line item.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment for identifying names and addresses and their functions relevant to the originator of the document in the RFF segment.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment to identify the office, branch or department to whom communication relevant to the document should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment for date/time/period relative to the referred document.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments giving information about dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Dangerous goods
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DGS, A segment to indicate the class of dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify quantity of the given dangerous goods.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment to describe dangerous goods.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A group of segments giving location information and where relevant, additional addresses, date and time, and quantities.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a specific location to which products will be delivered.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
NAD, A segment for identifying names and addresses and their functions relevant to the delivery point.
It is recommended that where possible only the coded form of the party ID should be specified, e.g. the buyer and seller are known to each other, thus only the coded ID is required. The consignee or delivery address may vary and would have to be clearly specified, preferably in structured format.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment providing date/time information relevant for delivery to the specific location.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify quantity for the given location.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments indicating the split placement of packages or unpacked goods into equipment.

medi:segment.name: Split goods placement
medi:segment.medi:documentation: SGP, A segment to specify the placement of goods in relation to one equipment. If goods are unpacked, their quantity would be given in the following QTY segment.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the quantity of unpacked goods being placed in a specific equipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments identifying one specific package or a number of packages, their marks and numbers, measurements, quantities, date and time information and handling instructions.

medi:segment.name: Package identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCI, A segment specifying marking and labels used on individual packages or a range of packages.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment giving the date/time details related to the goods within the packages e.g. expiration date.

medi:segment.name: Measurements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MEA, A segment specifying physical measurements of packages.

medi:segment.name: Quantity
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QTY, A segment to specify quantity per package.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 21: A group of segments giving package identification numbers and, where relevant, delivery limitation information.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment providing identification numbers being applied to the packages despatched.

medi:segment.name: Delivery limitations
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DLM, A segment to identify any limitation on delivery of goods e.g. hold until final approval by supplier.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 22: A group of segment providing information on hazardous materials and handling.

medi:segment.name: Handling instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: HAN, A segment providing information on handling and notification of hazardous materials.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information in coded or clear form to give further clarification, when required, for hazardous materials.

medi:segment.name: Goods identity number
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIN, A segment providing identification numbers being applied to the packages containing hazardous goods.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 23: A group of segments identifying quantity variances, the reason for the variance, and, when relevant, date and time information.

medi:segment.name: Quantity variances
medi:segment.medi:documentation: QVR, A segment identifying a quantity variance and the reason for the variance.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation:
DTM, A segment to give date and time information relative to the quantity variances, e.g. proposed delivery date on the back order.
4.1.3 Summary section
Information to be provided in the Summary section:

medi:segment.name: Control total
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CNT, A segment by which control totals may be provided by sender for checking by the receiver.
